pkgmetadata.longdescription: # BasetenThis is the Python client for [Baseten](https://baseten.co) and [Blueprint](https://blueprint.baseten.co).## InstallationInstall the latest version of the `baseten` package:```shpip install --upgrade baseten```## BasetenBaseten is a hosted platform for building ML-powered applications. Build apps with auto-scaling, GPU access, CRON jobs, and serverless functions.Visit our official documentation for Baseten at [docs.baseten.co](https://docs.baseten.co).## BlueprintBlueprint is the model fine-tuning and serving infrastructure for developers. It's powered by Baseten infrastructure and uses the baseten PyPi package.Visit our official documentation for Blueprint at [docs.blueprint.baseten.co](https://docs.blueprint.baseten.co).
